kw.name: Add Items To Cart
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Format Arguments
kw.msg: ${locator} = xpath://div[@class='inventory_item_name ' and text()='Sauce Labs Backpack']/ancestor::div[@class='inventory_item_description']//button[text()='Add to cart']
kw.doc: An example keyword that takes two arguments.

kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

test.doc: This test case verifies the end-to-end purchase flow on the Sauce Demo website.
